title: Constantly dropping connection
body: So, I've run out of options for things to try and fix this problem. My connection speed if pretty great I have around 30-40 down and a stellar 30-40 up. I have no idea why I'm having this connection issue and I've not seen a record of someone having anything similar. It started about 2 days ago, so I doubt anything has changed in that time. If anyone could provide some help that would be great. I've already tried a DNS flush, port forwarding, and closing out things like Steam and Spotify.

replies.body: Even with solid internet, you can still have issues connected to specifically servers like the game server.  You've tried some solid steps so far which is great, but I also recommend a full run through of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide.  The steps there should get you back in game.
Ok, I've tried that stuff. I'm going to try an ARAM to test I'll let you know how it fairs.
I recommend test in a custom game instead!  That way you don't have to worry about any penalties should something go wrong.
Is there anyway I can get my network log to you? I don't see an option to attach a file here.

Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our tech team can look into this with you.  You'll be able to attach logs through the ticket as well.  If you like, you can grab some additional logs as well through the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367).  We'll reply back asap!
Yeah, none of that stuff helped me out
